name: Firefox 4 Add-Ons Hide Compatibility Warning
description:
This hides on the compatibility warning only on enabled add-ons. If you want to hide it on disabled add-ons as well just comment or remove
".addon[status="installed"][active="true"]".

8.24.10 - updated for Minefield/4.0b5pre ID:20100824040950
8.13.10 - added additional -moz-document rule - thanks user 14691
